name: aeon-task-management-monorepo
description: AEON Vietnam Task Management System - Monorepo with HQ and Staff apps

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd ai-hq-task-assignment && npm install && cd ../staff-task-management && npm install && cd ../shared-data && npm install
scripts.build:hq: cd shared-data && npm install && cd ../ai-hq-task-assignment && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && VERCEL=true npm run build
scripts.build:staff: cd shared-data && npm install && cd ../staff-task-management && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && VERCEL=true npm run build
scripts.build:all: npm run build:hq && npm run build:staff
